title: Kyle Brandt on NFL Week 1, Ravens-Bengals Preview (Football 09/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech to break down the latest news and notes around the NFL, plus a preview of the Bengals-Ravens game. Then Will is joined by Kyle Brandt of NFL Network to break down the first week of the NFL season. What teams are the biggest surprises that you'd ride or die with? What teams surprised us the most? What storylines were the biggest overreactions? Do we believe in the Ravens because poolboy Lamar Jackson made Joe Flacco angry and turned him into a star again? If you only get one video game for the rest of your life, do you go with Tecmo Bowl, Mario Kart or Goldeneye? All those questions answered plus much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: John Breech joins Will Brinson to break down the latest in the NFL & Kyle Brandt joins the show to discuss surprise teams, storylines, and the one video game you would play the rest of your life.
